item.title: Hackeron
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Hackeron appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
Hackeron

Hackeron is a web application for online examinations for students. This application includes institute details, question-answer details, class details reports, etc. This application helps you to conduct online examinations without facing any difficulties.

About Hackeron Application

Hackeron is a hybrid web application deployed customized for online examination. This application allows the users to access the online examinations which include the institute details, question-answer details, class details reports, etc.

Hackeron web application has two web portals one is the staff to make questions, make class reports, analyze the result, etc. The other is for students to attend the online examination.

Hackeron - Features

Admin Portal

Dashboard

The dashboard of the staff portal helps you to get a quick detail of institutions, members, and the number of exams. With this dashboard, you’ll get a quick view of the overall. This provides on-demand access to all of your most important metrics and an enhanced preview of the metrics.  

Exam Page

This allows the user to add the upcoming exam and the scheduled exams. The exam will be added with the name, date, and duration of the exam. The scheduled exam can be viewed by the user. This includes the exam type like MCQ and Drag & Drop.

Question Page

The question page is where users can add the questions for the exams. It is a simple way to prepare the question. All you need is to select the exam and paste or type the question according to the exam types.

Faculty Page

This page is for the staff where they can add the staff and view the list of staff. The staff can be adding by with their name, username, password, email id, and the institute they work. Each staff has their username and password.

Result Page

The result can be downloaded from this page. The result will be downloaded according to the institute, department, section, and exam name. This way the result can be error-free. 

For Student

Student Portal

The student portal is for the students to attend the examination. The student needs to register before attending the examination. The student portal includes the dashboard, MCQ, and drag & drop. 

Technology We Used

Hybrid Application

  • Ionic 2
  • Angular JS4

Why Need Hackeron

Avoid manual errors in results.
Easy monitoring.
Conduct online examinations without any difficulties.
Easy maintenance of exams and results.
The simple way to maintain class reports.
Easy result calculation.
The download can be done at any time without any delay.
REQUEST A CALL BACK

We are always ahead
Professional Solutions for You

The post Hackeron appeared first on Hasotech.

item.title: Aldeazon – eCommerce Application
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Aldeazon – eCommerce Application appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
Aldeazon

Aldeazon is an eCommerce mobile and web application. This is a hybrid application where users can purchase their agriculture commodities. This application contains all the necessary commodities for agriculture.

About Aldeazon Application

Aldeazon is an eCommerce mobile and web application that allows users to purchase their agricultural commodities. The mobile application includes the category, shop, orders, shipping details, and wish list.

Aldeazon web application includes the Admin Portal, Procurement Portal shows all orders,  Supplier Portal, Credit Officer Portal for payment detail, and Transport Portal contains the delivery detail and driver detail.

Aldeazon Features

Mobile Application

Home Page

The home page of this application allows users to navigate to the other feature. The home pages show the recent popular item and the most viewed item so that users can easily know about the items and it increases the sales.

Category Page

This page makes it easier for the customer to choose the product they want in a short time. This feature came with a category of the product along with the number of items in those categories.

Shop

The shop page shows the list of items, you can sort the item by choosing it from the category. This gives the user more visibility of the item. They can easily get their item with this feature. 

Cart & Wish list Page

Aldeazon reduces the cart’s abundant rate since their favorite product can be added to the wish list and they can purchase it later. This feature helps you to find the customer’s most purchased items through their wish list.

Product Detail Page

The product detail page shows the information about the product in detail. This provides information on the product, technical description. This helps the customer to know completely about the product.

Web Application

Admin Portal

The admin has the access to all the other portals. They can add products, categories and check the delivery and driver detail. They can monitor the payment and the supplier detail too. 

Procurement Portal

The procurement portal is where all the orders have been placed. They can view the placed order with Product name, quantity, and date. This way they can maintain the orders data.

Credit Officer Portal

The Credit officer portal provides the payment detail of all the commodities. The Payment details can be downloaded at any time. This feature helps you to maintain payment records.

Transport Portal

This feature maintains the delivery details, and Drivers details. The delivery detail includes the product name, quantity, delivery status, delivery address. The driver details include the name of the driver, phone number, vehicle number. 

Technology We Used

Hybrid Application

  • Laravel
  • MySQL DB
  • Bootstrap
  • JQuery

Why Need Aldeazon Application

Increase your sales on agricultural commodities

Attract global customers.

Easy checkout.

Easy product management.

Maintain the payment details and delivery details.

Reduce the cart abundant with the wish list.

Ease the purchase by categorizing the items.

REQUEST A CALL BACK

We are always ahead
Professional Solutions for You

The post Aldeazon – eCommerce Application appeared first on Hasotech.

item.title: Travel Booking
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Travel Booking appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
Travel Booking

Managing the travels manually must be hard. We provide the solution to ease your work with a hybrid application.

About Travel Booking Application

Travel booking is a user’s manual booking system. This application helps you in booking, maintaining drivers, and admin using the application. This application includes Booking details, Driver details, Reports, booking history.

This application is deployed with a Hybrid application. This application is for both web and mobile. This application is highly scalable and performing. The advanced feature in this application makes this easy for you to manage your business.

For Web Application

Booking Office Details

This feature helps to book the service for the company. With this feature, you can easily book the vehicle for your guests and allocate the driver. The details of the booking will be displayed along with the company name, contact number, and name of the person. You can view the previous booking. This helps you to maintain the guest’s booking history.

Booking Details

The booking details include the guest’s name, contact number, booking date and time, pickup and drop location. This also includes the driver’s detail like name, contact number, mobile number, vehicle number, and model of vehicle. The detail can be sent to the guest through SMS. These details can be edited and viewed which avoids confusion.

Export Details

The export details can be downloaded just with the detail of date, company name, vehicle number, and driver’s name. With this, it helps you won’t miss any of the details of your guests.

Booking History

The booking history of the guests includes name, contact number, booking date, booking time, pickup, and drop location. With this, you can view your guest’s booking at any time.

For Mobile Application

Book Ride

The mobile application is only for the driver. They have an individual login id. The book ride includes the details of the guest, pick up and drop location, Ride starting time and ending time, ride starting and ending kilometers, the signature of driver and guest. With this, you can provide your customer an on-time pick-up and drop.

Technology We Used

Laravel

MySQL DB

Bootstrap

JQuery

Why Need Travel Booking Application

Easy maintenance on booking details.

Download the export report anytime.

Avoid confusion between customers.

View the previous travel details.

Maintenance of the driver.

Easy calculation on travel distance and time.

REQUEST A CALL BACK

We are always ahead
Professional Solutions for You

item.title: Amaz4u – eCommerce Web And Mobile Application
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Amaz4u – eCommerce Web And Mobile Application appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
Amaz4u

Amaz4u is an eCommerce mobile and web application. This is a hybrid application where users can purchase their products. By having an eCommerce application you can increase your ROI.

About Amaz4u Application

Amaz4u is an eCommerce mobile and web application that allows users to shop. In this mobile application, you can shop by choosing the category, home page contains the offers and other categories,  there will be an easy checkout process and payment method.

Amaz4u web application has the same features as the mobile application. Having both mobile and web application for an eCommerce increase your customer rate and increase your customer engagement.

Amaz4u- Features

Amaz4u - Mobile Application

Home Page

The home page of this application navigates the user to the Category page,  Cart page. The home page will show some of the latest offers and deals and categories.

Category Page

This page makes it easier for the customer to choose the product they want in a short time. With this feature, you can boost up your sales and make your products more apparent to your customers.

Cart Page

The Cart page is where users can view their product to be purchased. The users may add items to their shopping cart and then pay online. With this cart page, you can get to know about the user’s preference.

Checkout Page

Amaz4u makes an easy checkout page. The checkout process is simple in this so that you can reduce the cart abundance.  Making a simple checkout page use increases the purchase.

Payment

Payment can be done both online and offline. The payment process is simple and more secure. Once the payment is done user will get the confirmation notification to confirm their order.  

Amaz4u - Web Application

Web Application

The web application has the same feature as in the mobile application like home page, cart page, category page, checkout, and payment page. Having both web applications and mobile applications will benefit your eCommerce business. This makes the customer more convenient and increases your ROI. This enhances your customer engagement and better brand recognition. 

Technology We Used

Hybrid Application

  • Ionic 2
  • Angular JS2

Why Need Amaz4u Application

More apparent to customers.

Easy online payments method.

Easy subscription maintenance.

Better customer engagement.

Maintain vehicle details.

Better and easy access to your customers with your nearby branches.

Holds the customer for a long time.

REQUEST A CALL BACK

We are always ahead
Professional Solutions for You

item.title: MRNS A Web And Mobile Application
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post MRNS A Web And Mobile Application appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
MRNS

Calculating Laden and Unladen weight in the vehicle for the construction site might be difficult. We make it easy for you by providing a Web and mobile applications.

About MRNS Application

The MRNS application is to maintain the work on the construction site. This is a web and mobile application that includes the records of laden and unladen weight, material grade, material categories, thermal print, syncing data online.

The mobile application is deployed for the operator, supervisor whereas the web application is for the admin who has control over the operator and supervisor.  This application is mainly to maintain the record and to calculate the total weight. This application makes your work easy on the construction site.

For Mobile Application

For Operator

Records

The operator can create a new record to maintain the material, vehicle number, supplier name, laden and unladen weight, quantity. By this, the record can be created without any error. These records can be viewed at any time.

Sync

The created record will be automatically or manually to the supervisor. This feature makes it easy for sharing the records between the operator and supervisor. With this, they can get the record at no time. Avoid manual errors while sharing the records.

For Supervisor

Records

The records from the operators will be synced to them. They can view the record at any time. They get all records submitted by the operators. This feature will be useful for them to maintain the record for checking.

Offline

The submitted records will be approved or rejected either online or offline. This feature is mainly because of the construction site network. The work won’t be paused because of the network. They can continue their work without any disturbance.

Thermal Print

The approved records will be printed. With this, you can easily create the manual records in no time. This assures the record that can be printed in no time. You can print the approved record at any time.

Web Application

The web application is deployed for the admin who can maintain the whole. It includes the operators, supervisors, materials, and projects. They can manage these with the web application. They can save time and can maintain the report at any time. 

Technology We Used

Ionic

Angular

PHP

Why Need MRNS Application

Easy Way To Calculate The Total Weight.

Easy Billing.

Avoid Manual Errors.

Sync The Data Automatically Or Manually.

Maintain And Get The Records Automatically.

Avoid Confusion In Records By Approving And Rejecting.

REQUEST A CALL BACK

We are always ahead
Professional Solutions for You

The post MRNS A Web And Mobile Application appeared first on Hasotech.

item.title: Restaurant POS
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Restaurant POS appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
Restaurant POS

Managing the restaurant or the cafeteria is almost tiring thus we introduce  Restaurant POS which helps you to make the management easier and add profit to your business.

About Restaurant POS Application

Restaurant POS is a web application that is a complete point of sale software to manage your daily restaurant operations. It is designed to serve and assist the Food and Beverage (F&B) industry, restaurant management expedites every operation of the restaurant.

In this application, you can manage your restaurant’s easy billing, order management, dining management, managing the stock, and an eCommerce site. The main advantage of this application is it is bidirectional.

Food Order

Taking order manually takes your time and chances of making mistake is huge. But when the order is placed through an eCommerce application, saves your time. Order is directly sent to the kitchen server once it was taken. The order will be sent along with the table number. 

Mobile Application

Restaurant POS eCommerce application is available for android. In this application after login, you will see the home page consists of a number of floors with an available table so it’ll be easy to know your availability. The orders will be taken through this application. 

Mini Screen

The mini screen is the duplicate screen of the admin screen that displays only the placed orders. The duplicate screen can be placed in the kitchen so that the chef can view the placed order.

Bidirectional

The key advantage of this application is that it is bidirectional. When you update the F&B product on the POS screen it’ll directly be updated to the eCommerce site. It saves your time and work.

QR Scan

The customers can scan the QR code from the restaurant so that they can place the order along with the table number by themselves. Once the QR code is scanned you’ll be directed to the Food and beverages listed in categories and place the order in no time.

Payment

The payment can be done both online and in cash. The online payment is done by HitPay. Your payment will be done in a quick and secure way. 

Technology We Used

Web Application

  • AngularJS
  • ReactJS
  • VueJS
  • CodeIgniter

Mobile Application

  • Ionic

Payment Method

  • HitPay

Why Need Restaurant POS Application

Multiple Device Synchronization

Multiple Order Type Selection Modes And Screens.

Easy Item Modifications And Updates.

Quick Order Lookup.

Comfortable Payment Screen.

Table Order Taking.

Reduce Waiting Time.

Error Control

REQUEST A CALL BACK

We are always ahead

item.title: Madurai Children Hospital
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Madurai Children Hospital appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
Madurai Children Hospital

Manage the children’s vaccination online and make an appointment online. We make this possible by deploying a Web application.

About Madurai Children Hospital Application

This application specifically is used in hospitals to maintain the patient’s vaccination records, which is fairly significant. This application includes the SMS report, particularly the Weekly report, Patient’s details, and QR scanner for Online appointments.

Madurai children’s Hospital application is deployed for both web application and website. The web application maintains the patient’s details and their reports. Whereas websites used to get online appointments.

Patient’s Details

The patient’s details include the Name of the patient, Date of birth, mobile number, and their parent’s details. These will be used for patient registration. The appointments are made along with these details. This detail helps the hospital to maintain the patient’s record.

The patient’s vaccination list will be shown along with the due date to get the vaccination and the date of vaccination given to the patient. This helps maintain the vaccination record and to avoid confusion.

SMS Trigger

The SMS trigger is to remind the patient about their vaccination. The SMS trigger will be recorded in the SMS log. The SMS log includes the number of the patient, contact number, and the date of the SMS sent.  

The SMS trigger helps your patient to get vaccination on time. With this feature, you’ll not miss the vaccination. This helps to maintain the patient’s to get vaccination regularly.

Weekly Report

The Weekly report can be viewed from date to date. This helps you to maintain the patient’s report for a week. The weekly report enhances your performance to maintain the patient’s record in an easy way. The weekly record can be viewed at any time. You can get the patient’s record in no time.

Website

Appointments can be made online through the website. Online appointments can be done easily just by scanning the QR code. This makes it easy for the patients to make appointments. Through the website, you’ll be apparent to the people so they can approach the hospital. This makes an assurance to the people.

Technology We Used

Core PHP

WordPress

Bootstrap

Javascript

jQuery

Why Need Madurai Children Hospital Application

Easy Maintenance On The Patient’s Vaccination Record.

Easy Online Appointment.

Vaccination Remainder.

Avoid Confusion Where The Patient Is Vaccinated Or Not.

REQUEST A CALL BACK

We are always ahead
